articles.title: Experimental Design
articles.description:
As part of experimental design course in academics, i looked up for the parameters influancing housing prices. i used block model for this.
Score: 100
articles.contents:
2. Model and Variables Definision:
Definisions:
\(y_{ij} = \mu + \alpha_{j}+\beta_{i} + \varepsilon_{ij}\)
\(j\) = District
\(i\) = Municipal Status
\(y_{ij}\) - Average salary for employees by municipal status and district
\(\mu\) - Expectation
\(\alpha_{j}\) - Impact of treatment j
\(\beta_{i}\) - Effect of block i
\(\varepsilon_{ij}\) - Random error
Model Assumptions:
\(\varepsilon_{ijk}\) ~ \(Norm(0, Var^{2})\)
Independence of observations
Assumption of Equal Variance
Model Assumptions:
\(H_{0}\): \(\alpha_{1}\)=\(\alpha_{2}\)=\(\alpha_{3}\)=\(\alpha_{4}\)
\(H_{1}\): Else
\(H_{1}\): \(\beta_{1}\)=\(\beta_{2}\)=\(\beta_{3}\)=\(\beta_{4}\)
\(H_{1}\): Else
3. Data Wrengling:
xfun::embed_file(here::here(“Experimental_Design”, “_Design_files_data.xlsx”), text = Download data source here”)

            Bio
            At the last 10 years i gained great experience and
            knowledge while working in 4 organisation in data center
            industry. In parallel, i graduated Bachelors degree in
            industrial engineering and management and majored in
            information systems.
            Now, i am fill ready to look for my next challenge and
            opportunity. I am very interested in data filed so i aim a
            target to became a data analyst.
            This web page combining with my github page will expose
            my projects and capabilities to you.
            
            
            Education
            SCE | Beer-Sheva, Israel
            B.Sc. in Industrial Engineering and Management | October
            2018 - March 2023
            
            
            Experience
            Oracle | Senior Data Center Engineer |
            August 2021 - Present
            Leidos | Data Center Engineer | December
            2020 - May 2021
            M.S.R Engineering & Development |
            Data Center consultant | August 2017 - December 2020
